trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4TOWN_00584_GRAMSOL_000_001<tab>Move along, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Nothin' to see here.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4TOWN_00584_GRAMSOL_001_001<tab>Sorry, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, but I've nothin' to sell till the next shipment comes.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4TOWN_00584_SYSTEM_001_002<tab>You must progress further through the Shadowbringers main scenario in order to access this vendor's wares.

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4TOWN_00584_SYSTEM_001_012<tab>Once you have made a substantial contribution to the safety of Lakeland, Kholusia, Amh Araeng, Il Mheg, the Rak'tika Greatwood, and the Tempest, you will be able to trade with this vendor.

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4TOWN_00584_GRAMSOL_002_001<tab>You're in luck, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Shipments of goods from all over are finally makin' their way to the Crystarium. If you're willin' to part with a few bicolor gemstones, mayhap we can strike a bargain.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4TOWN_00584_SYSTEM_002_002<tab>Collect bicolor gemstones to trade for a variety of goods.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4TOWN_00584_GRAMSOL_003_001<tab>Anything you fancy, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>? If you've bicolor gemstones to spend, I'm sure I have something you're after.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4TOWN_00584_PEDRONILLE_000_001<tab>I am terribly sorry, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but I have nothing to sell at present.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4TOWN_00584_PEDRONILLE_001_001<tab>I am terribly sorry, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. A new shipment of wares is due any day now.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4TOWN_00584_PEDRONILLE_002_001<tab>I have the most wonderful news! We've just received a shipment of goods to sell. Perhaps we have something to your liking?
